sqlMap.select:
SELECT CS_CODE ,CS_TYPE ,CS_SUB_TYPE ,CS_NAME ,CS_VALUE ,CS_DESC ,CREATED_DATE ,CREATED_USER_CD FROM T_CODESTRING WHERE 1=1 AND T_CODESTRING.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(CS_CODE) Like '%'||(#cs_code:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CS_TYPE) Like '%'||(#cs_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CS_SUB_TYPE) Like '%'||(#cs_sub_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CS_NAME) Like '%'||(#cs_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CS_VALUE) Like '%'||(#cs_value:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CS_DESC) Like '%'||(#cs_desc:VARCHAR#)||'%'
TO_CHAR(CREATED_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') =TO_CHAR((#created_date:DATE#),'yyyy-MM-dd')
(CREATED_USER_CD) Like '%'||(#created_user_cd:VARCHAR#)||'%'
$orderStr$

SELECT count(1) FROM T_CODESTRING WHERE 1=1 AND T_CODESTRING.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(CS_CODE) Like '%'||(#cs_code:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CS_TYPE) Like '%'||(#cs_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CS_SUB_TYPE) Like '%'||(#cs_sub_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CS_NAME) Like '%'||(#cs_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CS_VALUE) Like '%'||(#cs_value:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CS_DESC) Like '%'||(#cs_desc:VARCHAR#)||'%'
TO_CHAR(CREATED_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd')=TO_CHAR((#created_date:DATE#),'yyyy-MM-dd')
(CREATED_USER_CD) Like '%'||(#created_user_cd:VARCHAR#)||'%'
